entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DllImportGenerator unit tests crashing on CI #60705
  • unify ThrowHelper methods #60703
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove unnecessary initialization of return values in generated code #60698
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] RegexCultureTests.Match_In_Different_Cultures test failures #60697
  • StreamReader can use ArrayPool instead of always allocating buffers #60694
  • Dependencies are not getting downloaded by dotnet restore command #60693
  • System.IO.StreamWriter writes an empty NewLine on dispose. #60689
  • Optimize workload upload step #60687
  • Segfault with net6.0 self-contained on linux-arm #60686
  • dotnet test host process crashed on Ubuntu 20.04 #60685
  • tracing/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol.sh failed on rolling build #60679
  • suggestion: enable FileStream Length caching on non-Windows #60677
  • Test failure profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.sh #60665
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add (e.g.) `out bool created` to MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen() #60664
  • [DllImportGenerator] Support down-level targets #60662
    7.0.0

Closed

  • System.Runtime.Tests tests fail on Android #37088
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Tests Fails on Android #50925
    7.0.0
  • Provide access to the raw byte data for a JsonElement for efficient transcoding of simple, custom types without allocating an intermediate string. #42839
    Future
  • Enum flags as JSON string array #42602
    Future
  • Test tracing/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol/eventactivityidcontrol.sh #60602
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer does not enforce enum values #42093
    Future
  • SetCreationTime on Mac #39132
    Future
  • Apphost defaults to wrong install location on multi-arch systems #59473
    7.0.0
  • Inject service into JsonConverter #34773
    Future
  • Add option to JsonStringEnumConverter for parsing strings but export numbers #40284
    Future
  • JsonConverter on record primary constructor #60690
  • String.IndexOf behaves differently between net5 and net6 #60680
  • Make OrderedDictionaryKeyValueCollection implement IList #56835
    Future
  • [DllImportGenerator] Improve handling of blittable signatures in source generator #60596
    7.0.0
  • JsonStringEnumConverter parses numbers when the token is a String even when allowIntegerValues is false #1301
    Future
  • With .NET 5.0.403 SDK(November update) installed, dotnet --info reports duplicates of paths #60674
  • Allow to get string as a byte array/ROS<byte> from the Utf8JsonReader #1563
    Future
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.RevocationTests.DynamicRevocationTests.RevokeEndEntity(pkiOptions: AllRevocation | IssuerAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder | RootAuthorityHasDesignatedOcspResponder) #60666
  • Mono: Implement TypedReference on top of ByReference #50253
    7.0.0
  • Blazor wasm aot build time #60466
  • Reflection.Emit platform support #60676
  • Move SuperPMI replay pipeline to "public" #59443
    7.0.0
  • BranchTrue not behaving the same way on ARM64 as AMD64 for a R8 value #60052
    7.0.0
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.IntegrationTests.BooleanTests.ValidateBoolIsMarshalledAsExpected #60663
  • `OrderBy` fail to return ordered result #60669

PullRequests

Created

  • [DO NOT MERGE] Test stateless pools #60704
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60702
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Misc build improvements #60701
    area-Build-mono
  • Add copies of binarytrees-6 and fannkuch-redux-9 #60700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Forward port changes from `release/6.0` in #60495 #60699
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix more alloc-dealloc mismatches #60691
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix loading a non wasm page and then returning to a wasm page. #60688
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix dependency of LLVM AOT jobs on CoreCLR product for CORE_ROOT #60681
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add test for blazor/sdk fix for lazy loaded assemblies #60673
    arch-wasm
  • Add HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() apis #60672
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Several tweaks to RegexGenerator (the tool, not the emitted code) #60667
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Distinguish callsite and callee VM-no-inline failure messages #60661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce time for Regex tests #60660
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Cleanup workloads for testing logic #60652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable failing DllImportGenerator.Tests.BooleanTests.ValidateBoolIsMarshalledAsExpected test for Mono #60692
    disabled-test, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Tweak workload build to use _GenerateMsiVersionString target #60695
    Servicing-consider, area-Meta
  • Skip building interop test native assets for Windows-only tests on non-Windows #60696
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60633
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Android] Skip/tweak some System.Runtime tests #60569
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Tweak workload build to use _GenerateMsiVersionString target #60634
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Disable SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #60678
    area-System.Console
  • Make unit tests for DllImportGenerator build/run in CI #60598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix "fix rid processing on macOS" #60668
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60364
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [DllImportGenerator] Don't generate a full stub body when the body does nothing #60601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete AssemblyLoadContext30Extensions test #60670
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [tests] In test wrapper scripts if -debug is gdb or lldb, add separator before corerun and args #60416
    test enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Port InformationalVersion fix to Mono corelib #60614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix condition for dependOnEvaluatePaths for runtime-community pipeline #60552
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Share TypedReference managed code between CoreCLR and Mono #60636
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix Regex outerloop tests for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #60647
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation on how VN numbers memory #60476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure outgoing arg space for stack cookie fail fast #60615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update benchmark runs for superpmi collection to use net7.0 #60671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • [hackathon] `ValueArray` - a compliment type to the `Span`, which owns its data without indirections. #60519
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add test for profiler inlining #60225
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #60058
    area-Single-File
  • Make noise if trying to use the cache after it's been disposed. #57557
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 7.0.0
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Don't special case "Experimental" projects #60641
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Rerun mobile target jobs when it fails for 4 known scenarios #60475
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid int[] allocation in ResourceReader when reading a decimal #60408
    area-System.Resources
  • Attempt to fix observed AV in mark_through_cards_for_segments #60617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [llvmonly] Optimize delegate invocation. #60593
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/5.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60496
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • [wip] Run tests on Android 21 #54217
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WIP] Enable runtime tests to run on Android arm32 #51642
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60577
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create validator for workloads to make sure that they follow the right format and guidance #22224
    7.0.1xx
  • Build fails on ARM64 Linux, likely because of issue with workload SDK resolver #22221
  • dotnet-sdk installs bogus `~/.dotnet/tools` entry as `/etc/paths.d/dotnet-cli-tools` #22214
  • Add support for `dotnet add package [package] --prelease` #22206
  • dotnet publish output option copy old packages to the publish folder #22220
  • Web Application build error with net6.0 framework, Failed to sign apphost with error code 0 #22201
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-115300-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #22192

Closed

  • Could not execute because the application was not found or a compatible .NET SDK is not installed. #14916
    6.0.1xx
  • Optional Workload Acquisition #14957
    6.0.1xx
  • When a workload is missing, trigger the product acquisition experience #14953
    6.0.1xx
  • Given the npukg and manifest from workload owner, a tool can convert to an msi #14952
    6.0.1xx
  • Admin install for optional workloads #14956
    6.0.1xx
  • Users can more easily acquire the SDK and runtimes on CI machines and other non-admin installs #14959
    7.0.1xx
  • VS mac update/installer - .NET SDK integration #16484
    6.0.1xx
  • Command line build fails but works in Visual Studio #21715

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove Hot Reload support from dotnet watch #22217
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fixup some dependencies #22216
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move all shared workload options to install command #22190
    Area-Workloads
  • Update the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp and Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.C… #22213
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Revive skipped / scoped tests #21181
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • Argument BC(--r/--a), add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22146
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fix up-to-date check on static web assets #22045
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Open issue: non-negative assumption should apply to both Count and Length #5137

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Only Allow Lexical Keywords in the Language #4460
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assert fails in SourceGeneratedFileItemSource.cs line 120 #57287
  • Remove InlineHintsOptions.DisplayAllOverride #57283
  • [Coming Soon] Require .NET 6 RC2 SDK for Roslyn development #57282
  • Formatting analyzer is extremely noisy for object initializers. #57279
  • [LSP] Race in LSP document tracker when accessing tracked documents from non-mutating handlers #57276
  • Delete a class enhancement #57275
  • Non static quick fix enhancement #57274
  • Change access level #57273
  • Auto suggest access level #57272
  • Add all missing using directives to a file #57271
  • roslyn-integration-lsp-CI always fails #57267
  • Code inspection tool that lists all unused code #57264
    Backlog
  • VS Quick Info code sample formatting not preserved #57262
    17.1
  • `IncludePackageReferencesDuringMarkupCompilation` causes build errors with WPF projects #57259
  • Background for editor config editors tabs are the wrong color on light theme #57255
    17.1
  • Move SkipAnalyzersForImplicitlyTriggeredBuilds to build options #57253
    17.1
  • GetFullyLoadedOpenDocumentInCurrentContextWithChanges hangs #57250
    17.1
  • ENC0053 incorrectly reported for edits made to a method containing a lambda, with dynamically versioned assembly #57249
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Complete] Require .NET 6 RC1 SDK for Roslyn development #56612
  • Incorrent automatic indenting of C# comments #57261
    17.1
  • SyntaxNode.Span text is incorrect [10..20) instead [10..20] #57265
  • Emit tests are approaching the string limit #57226
  • Potential fixes missing add using statement in certain situations #57208
    17.0
  • Add a "add breakpoint" in the context menu when clicking on a margin of an overridden member #57229
  • Line length formatting to be apart of EditorConfig #57263
    Backlog
  • Named mutex bug on .NET using Mono runtime causing compile server OOM #57002
    17.1
  • Source generators: generated code visibility/accessibility #57258

PullRequests

Created

  • [hackathon] Support nice syntax for ValueArray in most type contexts. #57286
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57285
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Bump global.json pinned SDK version to NET 6 RC2 #57281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add Features projects to SourceBuild #57277
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • If Length and Count are both present, only the former is assumed to be non-negative #57268
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57266
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix a race condition in CompilationWithAnalyzers #57260
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Options5 #57254
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • [hackathon] Support for ValueArray in C# escape analysis. #57218
    Area-Compilers
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • Add solution sync time telemetry #57269
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Resolve conflicts merging main to features/param-nullchecking #57280
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main with conflicts #57278
  • Add Emit2 test project #57238
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57256
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57251
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57248
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57252
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix ServiceHub Core host option #57223
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge, 17.0
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57288
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Update extract method to support top-level statements #57084
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Switch to 1ES build pools release/dev17.0 #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: counterexample for non-exhaustive switch expressions #55327
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Implement 'Enable nullable reference types' refactoring #57200
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, 17.1.P1
  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • IDECoreBenchmarks Changes #57112
    Area-IDE
  • Fix import reader #57117
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • List patterns: main IDE scenarios and AddRequiredParens #53850
    Area-IDE, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get IP adress blazor server side #37728
  • Route Constraints #37727
  • Blazor: Changes in a dependent project do not trigger a recompile. #37722
  • Webaudio api in blazor #37719
  • .NET 6 RC2 Blazor with server side rendering and Azure B2C #37713
  • Removing lib folder with bootstrap and others, and html Links from template project, continues causing build errors #37711
  • dotnet watch run does not reload application in a Blazor wasm app #37708
  • SignalR Question: Multiple hubs working with single connection #37702
  • SignalR typescript client fails to add custom headers #37700
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper #37699
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix #37698
  • `IDistributedCache` for set/list/hash #37697
  • Blazor WASM - Lazy Loading and Dependency Injection #37695

Closed

  • Blazor: ship .NET in browsers #37720
  • Blazor WASM Debugging in VS launches Edge with a separate user data directory #20915
    6.0-docs-infra
  • CS0234 : The type or namespace name '...' does not exist in the namespace '__Blazor....' #37482
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor razor editor memory issues .Net 6 RC2 #37724
  • Razor tooling shows false error 'Ambiguous reference between 'NS1.XYZ' and 'NS2.XYZ' #37665
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting throws Startup assembly StartupBootstrapper failed to execute #14547
    Next sprint planning
  • Update RZ9992 Diagnostic Error Link #37669
    7.0-preview1
  • Investigate CI Test Resource Contention #33371
    6.0-docs-infra
  • ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Reload #35109
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Blazor IntelliSense in Visual Studio 2022 #37709
  • ExceptionHandlerMiddleware log message too generic #3303
    Backlog
  • No longer have access to HttpCookie objects #37714
  • Open ValidationMessage and ValidationSummary for extensibility #37707
  • Strange phenomenon on CORS between Blazor Wasm and Blazor Server #37622
  • Add `msftbot` comment when `Needs: Author Feedback` label is added #37683
    Next sprint planning
  • Blazor server, UICulture set on first instantiation is remembered after user sets new culture #37705
  • Preserve state of scoped object instantiated in Program.cs in all razor files ? #37703
  • System.ArgumentException: 'The path must be absolute.' Use Docker #37704
  • Blazor: Provide common callback mechanism for when Blazor starts #17504
    Backlog
  • Cyrillic becomes questions ����� #37677
  • Consider making RoutingMarkerService public #37679
  • Improve error handling in template tests #37656
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Reenable ComponentsAnalyzer #18611
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade Selenium Versions #37726
  • Continue using HashCodeCombiner in Razor.Language #37725
    area-mvc
  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor
  • Remove retries from BlazorWasm template tests & don't fail on restore errors #37715
    area-mvc
  • [Helix] Switch to win11 for pr checks #37712
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix test typos #37701
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #37696
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Enable targeting pack build during source-build #37688
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Remove stale link for `RZ9992` Diagnostic #37716
    area-mvc, area-blazor, area-razor.compiler, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve restore error reporting during dotnet new #37682
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Reenable ComponentsAnalyzer #37692
    7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `075810f` to `16f637f` #37640
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support setting ApiParameterRouetInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37672
    area-infrastructure
  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20

Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Star Grid lengths using decimal values don't appear to work #3053
  • Only Android dll's are produced when building a MAUI library #3049
  • Changes to the way Dispatchers work #3048
  • [Bug] Dynamic changes inside navigation page not getting reflected in UI #3046
  • [Bug] OnChildMeasureInvalidated Method is not triggered at runtime. #3044

Closed

  • [question] what do you suggest for windows 7 users ? #3004
  • [Bug] OnChildMeasureInvalidated method is Not triggered at runtime. #3043

PullRequests

Created

  • Signal native text changes to Entry on Windows #3054
  • Ensure ScrollView performs cross-platform measure #3050
  • Add Collectionview sample galleries #3047
    area/controls 🎮
  • Clean up the Application extensions #3042

Merged

  • Comment out windows in the templates #3052
    area/templates 📄
  • Specify the minimum versions of the platforms #2905
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add Variable to select provision vs or not #3045
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3041
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Add `ITextButton` and related Mappers #2868
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Handler]Collectionview handler for iOS #2156
  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Add -NoProfile switch for PowerShell commands #3036
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove IPlatformServices.GetHash #2707
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.101-preview.10

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ef Core - On the Fly? #26416
  • Remove reference to Relational.Tests from AspNet.Specification tests #26415
  • Scaffolding a new migration with a custom operation type #26413
  • Model from #16536 leaves unused foreign key column after finialization #26412
    7.0.0
  • Do not generate Convert node in SQL if the converted store type is identical to the operand's #26411
  • Allow method/member translators to provide translation failure error details #26410

Closed

  • ServiceProviderCache adds more and more IServiceProviders when running integration tests #16369
  • Allow users to check connection string used by database update operation #15689

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unable to build RC2 installer from source #12422
  • Error installing 6.0.100-rc.2.21505.57-win-arm64 #12459

Updated

  • improve download speed #12416

PullRequests

Created
